title: New Creator: Emery
body:
Emery
FB - https://www.facebook.com/emery 
IG - https://www.instagram.com/emeryofficial 
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/officialemery 
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/emerymusic
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/emerymusic

Bio: Emery is an emo-rock band that started in 2001. We’ve toured worldwide on 8 full length album releases (9th coming this summer), multiple EPs and multiple exclusive releases to our private membership club called Emeryland. We continue to make new EPs quarterly and full lengths yearly. Emeryland is a growing and sustainable community and we want to continue incorporating more ways to grow a cohesive, collaborative community that sustains the art at the center while enhancing relationships and value.

Use Cases
1) Distribution of Gift Coin: Rewards for monthly subscribers in discord server and other Emeryland members, giveaways through games, livestream events and podcasts. 
2) Incentives for HODLers: Added “Coinholder” Role and badge, extra privileges like a private channel that include band interaction and other exclusive perks.
3) Transaction Commitments: Emery will sell exclusive merchandise such as handwritten lyric sheets, vinyl test presses and other special merchandise. Emery will sell custom songs and exclusive acoustic versions.

Treasury Grant
$1000

A 'yes' approves $EMERY and a $1000 gift coin treasury grant
A 'no' denies this prop
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
